https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3TY6LThF2mvewEQysobq8XA7Mc2.jpg The two best friends Casper and Emma travel to Africa with Emma's mom, grandfather and their faithful companions Miss Bunny and Lion Cub. There they meet the five-year-old Tiri and her stuffed animal Turte. They take their new friends on a safari, and on the trip they find Leo, a lion cub that's lost its mom. Casper and Emma on Safari
